CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 5, 1953, pg. 23 reads: "Curtaineers Entertain - Members of the Curtaineers, interracial drama group, sponsored by the Irene Kaufmann Settlement, entertained last Thursday evening for Mrs. Canada Lee, widow of the noted actor, as she returned from a transcontinental tour in behalf of the Canada Lee Memorial Foundation, the purpose of which is to aid and encourage young people in the field of the drama. Left to right: Miss Jane Ellen Ball, president of the Drama League of Pittsburgh; Mrs. Lee, Willis Walker of the Curtaineers, and Rose Caputo of the Curtaineers. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Members of Curtaineers interracial drama group Jane Ellen Ball, Frances Pollack Lee, Willis Walker, and Rose Caputo, posed in Irene Kaufmann Settlement
